      • setConfidence

        public DocumentRelation.Builder setConfidence(float confidence)
        Sets the confidence of the relation being built. If not called, the confidence will be 1.
        Parameters:
        confidence - the confidence to assign
        Returns:
        the Builder. Useful for chaining

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the Builder. Useful for chaining
